TopicTitle: So, planet factory, novapunch, B9 aerospace, bunch of other mods, lack luster.

Articles.Content:
And still no crash, huh also S.X.T.

Ion engines, other stuff, and still not crashing.

Probably because novapunch and squad both have texture reductions on them.

So, what mods do you use?

I am keeping it as Vanilla as I can.

But I use the following:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢BoulderCo - Clouds

And I experience no crashes at all.... only sometimes

HA you mod weaklings!

Kas

and last but not least RCS sound/light......HUUU TOP THAT.

plus a few parts i made my self

and all with no crashes......EVER! my game has yet to crash.

Edited March 21, 2014 by Tidus Klein
Oh yeah, lets compare sizes. My GameData directory is 5cm bigger than yours! Proof:

Oh yeah, lets compare sizes. My GameData directory is 5cm bigger than yours! Proof:

http://i.imgur.com/hmJPU97.png

Out of interest, how long does it take to start up with that lot installed? I have an install with the default realism overhaul pack plus SCANsat and that takes about 12 minutes to start up. Not fun when you're trying to debug a plugin problem...

A little less than 4min to the main menu. Thats the beauty of not loading textures on startup

Though it admittedly takes another ~2min until background-loading part texture thumbs finishes.
